Mayank Shah is a Senior Software Engineer at Percona and works on the Percona Cloud Team. He specializes in Kubernetes, operators, and building cloud-native applications. Passionate about Kubernetes and databases, Mayank enjoys designing systems that make managing data infrastructure simpler and more reliable.
